description: This file contains the UI implementation for the game screen in a Flutter Tic Tac Toe app, including various widgets like score header, turn indicator, game board, and control buttons, along with their associated logic and styling.

classes.name: GameScreen
classes.description: Main widget displaying the game's user interface, including header, board, and controls.

classes.name: _ScoreHeader
classes.description: Widget displaying the current scores and game mode.

classes.name: _ScorePill
classes.description: Widget displaying individual player's score in a pill-shaped container.

classes.name: _TurnIndicator
classes.description: Widget indicating whose turn it is or game result.

classes.name: _Board
classes.description: Widget rendering the Tic Tac Toe grid and handling cell layout.

classes.name: _BoardCell
classes.description: Widget representing a single cell in the Tic Tac Toe grid, handling display and tap interactions.

classes.name: _ControlsBar
classes.description: Widget providing buttons for resetting the round and scores.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each widget class, arranging respective UI components.
